thread.title: 'Refugees welcome': Statue of Liberty gets a make-over
thread.title_full: 'Refugees welcome': Statue of Liberty gets a make-over

author: Associated Press
title: 'Refugees welcome': Statue of Liberty gets a make-over
text:
US news 'Refugees welcome': Statue of Liberty gets a make-over 
The US National Park Service is trying to work out who unfurled a giant banner at the base of the Statue of Liberty saying ‘Refugees welcome’. In this photo provided by Vitória Londero, a giant banner saying ‘Refugees welcome’ hangs on the pedestal of the Statue of Liberty. National Park Service spokesman Jerry Willis said the banner was hung from the public observation deck on Tuesday afternoon. It was taken down more than an hour later. The stunt took place the day the Department of Homeland Security announced expanded immigration enforcement policies . Photograph: Vitória Londero/AP View more sharing options
